SELECT max(${item.id}) id, '${item.tableName}' tableName FROM ${item.tableName}
${item.id} like '${item.machineCode}%'

mapper.select: select c.column_name id , UPPER(t.table_name) tableName from information_schema.table_constraints as t,information_schema.key_column_usage as c where t.table_name = c.table_name and t.table_schema = database() and t.constraint_type = 'PRIMARY KEY'
